eyinda thathiganna nimi raju owun hise anantha duk windimata hethu wimasayi.eeta pilithuru dena mathali pawasanne me pirisa mese duk windimata hethuwanne masuru bawin yukthawa anunata dena deya walakwa, pindupinisa paminena shramana brahmanayanta yamak nodi akrosha paribhawa kala nisa ehi wipaka washayen mese niraye ipida anantha duk windina bawayi.ye kewime machcharino kadariya paribhasaka samanabrahmananan, hinsanthirosanthi supapadhamma the luddakamma pasawethwa papan theme jane kakolasangga adanthieeta pasu mathali wisin nimi rajuwa,ginidal sahitha polowehi eha meha yana rath wu dandu muguruwalin nithara thalena niri sathun athi thanakata ragena yayi.
